title: My skin shard disappeared
body: i had 3 skin shards one of them disappeared today , when i opened my client and went to loot  i didn't find it (and no i didn't disenchanted it , and my orange essence didn't increase, still at 0 from last time)

replies.body: Hmmmm that's no good! I'm looking over your loot now, and it does seem like you've only got one skin shard right now. Do you remember which shard it was that disappeared so that I can look to see what might have happened and see about getting it back to you?

Ahaaaa, it does look like Demon VI was disenchanted. That orange essence was then used to unlock Hired Gun Lucian as a permanent skin. If you weren't the one who disenchanted that shard, you may need to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to secure your account.
